thread.title: Conference to showcase Ghana's tourism potential to the world
thread.title_full: Conference to showcase Ghana's tourism potential to the world

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Conference to showcase Ghana's tourism potential to the world
text:
Conference to showcase Ghana's tourism potential to the world   
Aug 09, 2015 Ghana's Minister of Tourism, Culture and Creative Arts, Elizabeth Ofosu-Agyare   
ACCRA, Ghana - Next week Ghana will host a conference on branding Africa. 
About twenty-four African Ministers of Tourism have already confirmed their participation including the UNWTO Secretary General. 
President John Mahama is expected to open the conference. 
The Minister of Tourism, Culture and Creative Arts, Mrs. Elizabeth Ofosu-Agyare, who announced this at a media launch in Accra said the event will showcase Ghana's tourism potential to the World.
